pendingApproval.title: Account Pending Approval
pendingApproval.description: Your chef account is currently under review by our admin team. This process typically takes 24-48 hours.
pendingApproval.whatNextDescription: We'll review your submitted documents and kitchen information. You'll receive an email notification once your account is approved.
pendingApproval.needHelp: Need immediate assistance? Contact us at support@tablya.com

cards.homemadeMealsDesc: Enjoy a diverse menu of dishes made with love and fresh ingredients
cards.supportCooksDesc: Empower talented home cooks in your community and taste their passion
cards.easyDeliveryDesc: Get your favourite meals delivered right to your doorstep, hassle-free

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.customerReview: I'm so glad I found this website! The food is incredible, and it feels so good to support local cooks. It's like having a home-cooked meal without any of the work
